attributes.action: Remove the 'British' from 'British Telecom' because of their poor service
attributes.background:
British Telecom used to be the premier national telecoms company of the U.K.  Now the levels of service they offer are atrocious, the roll-out of fibre Broadband is taking forever and their customer service is poor. 
They do not provide a service worthy of the word 'British' in their company name.
